title: Best of The Program | Guest: David Pietrusza | 6/7/21
description:
A psychiatrist giving a lecture at Yale spoke about her fantasy of killing white people and argued that they’re psychotic and “demented.” Glenn and Pat discuss how dangerous this mindset is. Glenn goes through a Bible prophecy that exactly mirrors today’s society and provides ways we can stand up against these evils. Author and historian David Pietrusza calls in to discuss the anniversary of D-Day and what it really was like on that horrific day as society rewrites and forgets history.
